history.text: I loved toy story
Hello, do you feel it is worth watching?
yes definetely, it has 100% on rotten tomatoes
Great! and what is that you like most about it?
i loved the concept of the toys being alive when no one was watching
it was also very funny and had adult themes
Is it made with hand-drawn animation, like, for example,The Jungle Book or Snow White/
no it is more computer-animated from pixar
do you like animated films
I love them. it is my overall type of movie, since it is the most likely genre I can watch my the entire family.
are there villains in this movie, somebody playing the bad guy?
yes this is a family friendly film
there isn't really a main villian but there is competitiveness and rivalry between the main characters of woody and buzz
then circumstances with a bad charcter cause them to cometogether
Wow, sounds really interesting. Any famous acors lending their voices to the characters?
tom hanks voices woody and tim allen is buzz
They are excellent actors so no wonder how many people give good reviews about that movie. Do you think it will not be too scary to toddlers or small children?
i think it will be appropriate because it is a family movie, it is not geared toward being scary
Sounds good. Another thing I look forward to when thinking of a family movie is the score. Do you know any song of the movie or, by the way, who makes the music?
the score is wonderful and helps with the movie watching experience in this movie
i do not know who does the score
OK, anyway it should be good. I wonder  if being a toy story , does it have in the cast any famous toy you can buy in a store?
well the characters like woody, buzz, and t-rex are all charcters in a film about toys, but are fictional and not based on real life toys, im sure you can buy them in the store now however
sid phillips is their neighbor and he is the scary villian in the movie, so he might be a little frightening for kids but other than that the movie is very kid friendly
Thanks for mentioning Sid, i will try to work out with my kids on that. I cannot wait to get one of those toys for them before going to the movies with them!
yes if they play with them and see them on screen they will be more attached to the movie
especially when they see all the adventures the toys get into like when the toys have to get out of the house and get into the car
Wow, sounds like a very interesting scene.. and a very interesting plot.
Who wrote the story?
yes the toys are alive when no one is around and have adventures
the director is john lasseter
the screenplay was by lasseter, pete doctor stanton ans joe ranft
Wow.. sounds like a good plan.You can count me in to rent it for the weekend!
good it has really good themes for kids like friendship and jealousy and working together
Great. Ok. Thanks a lot for your information and recommendation.
have a good day
thanks you too
